welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedInProgress: Seeding in progress... This may take a moment.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded successfully! You may need to refresh to see all changes.
login.title: Login to Your Account
login.descDefault: Enter your credentials to access your account.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: Please verify your email address {{email}} before logging in. Check your inbox (and spam folder) for the verification link.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found after login. Please contact support.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your profile. Please try again.
login.error.invalidCredentialsGeneric: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.genericFail: Login failed. An unexpected error occurred.
login.error.googleAuthFailed: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Could not retrieve your profile after Google Sign-In ({{reason}}).
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this email address using a different sign-in method.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again later.
signup.title: Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Create an account to participate in discussions and governance.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself and why you want to join (min. 50 characters). This will be public in your admission request.
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Presentation must be at least 50 characters. Please fill it out before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: You must agree to the terms and conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.userSanctioned: Account {{username}} is currently sanctioned and cannot re-register.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during Google Sign-Up.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this email. Please log in or use a different Google account.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please provide a presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the terms and conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Please try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or try again.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: Password reset link sent to {{email}} if the account exists.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Check Your Email!
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please click the link to activate your account.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation Status
confirmPage.default.description: Please check the URL or go back to the previous page.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.

agoraPage.title: The Agora
agoraPage.description: This is the Agora, where binding community decisions are made. Propose initiatives, debate, and cast your vote to shape the future of Kratia.
agoraPage.error.agoraForumNotFound: The Agora forum document (ID: 'agora') was not found. Please ensure it has been seeded correctly.
agoraPage.error.agoraForumNotFoundDesc: The main Agora forum could not be loaded. This is a configuration issue.
agoraPage.error.loadFail: Failed to load Agora details or votations. Please try again.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.title: Proposal Rights Required
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.underSa: You cannot make proposals while under a sanction process.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.sanctio: You are sanctioned and cannot make proposals.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.noVotin: You need voting rights to make proposals.
agoraPage.beTheFirst: Be the first to propose something for the community to vote on!
agoraPage.loginToPropose: You need to be a registered and admitted member to propose votations.
proposeConstitution.title: Propose Constitution Change
proposeConstitution.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to modify the site's Rules and Conditions. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.error.notFound: Constitution document not found. Cannot propose changes.
proposeConstitution.error.loadFail: Failed to load current constitution. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.title: Access Denied
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.descrip: You do not have permission to propose constitution changes. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeConstitution.toast.noChanges.desc: The proposed constitution text is identical to the current one.
proposeConstitution.votationDescription: Proposal to change the site constitution. Justification: {{justification}}
proposeConstitution.toast.success.title: Constitution Change Proposed!
proposeConstitution.toast.success.descri: The votation for "{{proposalTitle}}" has been created in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.toast.error.descript: Failed to propose constitution change. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Update Article 3 regarding Karma System
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain why these changes are proposed and their expected impact.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the ENTIRE constitution text here, with your proposed modifications.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Edit the text below. The current constitution is pre-filled for your convenience.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.

proposeNewForum.importantNotice.descript: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
